price: On je poslao Poslanika Svog s Uputom i vjerom istinitom da bi je uzdigao iznad svih vjera. A Allah je dovoljan Svjedok!
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلۡحَقِّ لِيُظۡهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī arsala rasūlahu bil-hudā wadīni al-ḥaqi liyuẓ'hirahu ʿalā al-dīni kullihi wakafā bil-lahi shahīdan
